resources.string: 1. Send Us your Photos through the upload files section,by email or our chats.Include the Instructions on what you want.You can also share large files with Us through WeTransfer,Dropbox or google drive.
2. We shall provide you with a no-obligation price quote.
3. Once you are okay with the price quote,you can head to the payment section of our app and select your prefered mode of payment to make the payment
4. When payment is received we will notify you by email and start processing your order.
5. Edited pictures will be delivered to you in the chat section and by email after your suggestions or changes have been done.

We use your data to improve the services.By using the services,you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.Unless otherwise defined in this privacy Policy ,Terms used in our Terms and conditions.
We collect several different types of information for various purposes and improve our Service to you

While using our Services We may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable informations that can be used to contact or identify you (Personal Data).Personallyidentiable information may be include but its not limited to:
